name: interestedly

in a way that shows you want to give your attention to something and discover more about it: All the other parents were watching the scene interestedly. I tried to smile interestedly as she began telling another story about her holiday.
More examplesFewer examplesI watched interestedly as the engineer took the back off the machine and adjusted various dials.I suddenly noticed how interestedly the woman in the red coat was looking at me.Jack enquired interestedly about how my children were getting on at school.
